summary: Dheepan is a Sri Lankan Tamil warrior who flees to France and ends up working as a caretaker outside Paris.
cast: Jesuthasan Antonythasan|Kalieaswari Srinivasan|Claudine Vinasithamby|Vincent Rottiers|Faouzi Bensaïdi|Marc Zinga|Bass Dhem|Franck Falise|Joséphine de Meaux|Jean-Baptiste Pouilloux|Nathan Anthonypillai|Vasanth Selvam|Kartik Krishnan|Rudhrah|Tassadit Mandi|Marie Trichet|Tarik Lamli|Joël Boudjelta|Moussa Belhamar|Akim Chir|Sandor Funtek|Aymen Saïdi|Soufiane Guerrab|Keasavan Paramasamy|Suthagar Shanmugalingam|Thurainesan Thurasingham|Jegan Sivarasa|Kopiraj Shanmuganathan|Kanagaratham Subakaran|Manickam Paramanathan|Sinnaruthai Manoharan|Eric Douré|Jana Bittnerová|Jean-Michel Correia|Alexandre Michel|Max Geller|Sandra Murugiah|Sal Yusuf
title: Dheepan
